data.name: Escape Condition
data.detailed_description:
ESCAPE CONDITION is a time-travel, first-person, action RPG.

Each day, you will use a time travel rune to go to the future or past, completing a mission that will permanently change the world, and/or your character. Rather than a traditional points-based RPG progression system, in ESCAPE CONDITION your completed missions determine your class (MAGE, EXPLORER, or CYBORG).

The series of missions you complete in ESCAPE CONDITION leads up to your final battle against THE BEAST for control of the modern world your decisions have created.
